snippet: While many in George W. Bush’s circle are enthusiastic, many of those who worked for him have not rushed to join his brother’s emerging 2016 operation.
abstract: Many supporters of George W Bush are enthusiastic about brother Jeb's possible bid for 2016 Republican presidential nomination, but some people who worked for former president are not rushing to back his brother's campaign; Bush brothers' political orbits have long been separate; some people are resistant to the notion of dynastic presidency passed among family members, while others are not sold on Jeb Bush specifically.
lead_paragraph: While many in George W. Bush’s circle are enthusiastic, many of those who worked for him have not rushed to join his brother’s emerging 2016 operation.

headline.main: Jeb Bush Faces Challenge in Winning Over Brother’s Team
headline.print_headline: Brother’s Team Far From United Behind Jeb Bush
